rukus.text: allaha ta'ala'e ja tamara manthi ekane bija para rojimam vadharo apyo che, basa! Jemane vadhare apavamam avyum che, te potani roji potani hethala kama karanara majurone nathi apata, e bhayathi ke te (jemane vadhare apyum che) ane te'o (majuro) banne sarakha tha'i jaya. To sum a loko allahani ne'amatono inkara kari rahya che

allaha ta'ala'e tamara mate tamara manthi ja tamari patni'onum sarjana karyum ane tamari patni'o dvara tamara mate tamara balako ane pautra peda karya ane tamane sari ane uttama vastu'o khava mate api, sum to pana loko asatya para imana lavase? Ane allaha ta'alani ne'amatone inkara karase
ane te allaha ta'alane chodine, te lokoni bandagi kare che je akaso ane dharati manthi temane kami pana roji nathi api sakata ane na to kami pana sakti dharave che
basa! Allaha ta'ala mate udaharano na apo, allaha ta'ala khuba sari rite jane che ane tame nathi janata

allaha ta'ala eka udaharananum varnana kare che ke, bijani maliki hethala eka dasa che, je ko'i vatano adhikara nathi dharavato ane eka bijo vyakti che, jene ame potani pasethi purati roji api che, jemanthi te chupi rite tatha jahera rite dana kare che, sum a badha sarakham ho'i sake che? Allaha ta'ala mate ja badhi prasansa che, parantu temana manthi vadhare padata loko janata nathi

Allaha ta'ala eka bijum udaharana varnana kare che, be vyakti'onum, jemanthi eka to mungo che ane ko'i vastu para adhikara nathi dharavato, parantu te potana malika mate boja che, jyam pana tene mokalavamam ave tenathi bhala'ini apeksa karavamam nathi avati, sum a ane te je n'yaya karavano adesa ape che tatha satyamarga para ja cale che, banne sarakham ho'i sake che
